post:
UltraVPS.eu offers the following special deals while stock lasts.

----------------

Low End virtual servers
--------------------

Currently available in Duessledorf, Germany only. Please note that affiliate links are not valid for these offers (no discounts, no commissions).

**LowEndServer-1**

* KVM virtualization
* 256 MB RAM
* 1 CPU Core
* 10 GB RAID-10 SATA Storage
* 500 GB Monthly Transfer
* 1 IPv4 address
* 10 IPv6 addresses (from your own /64 IPv6 subnet)
* Contract term: 12 months

12 EUR incl. VAT per year (~ 12 USD excl. VAT)

[[ Order Link ]](https://www.ultravps.eu/order/order.pl?cat=cloudserver_lowend&lang=en)

**LowEndServer-2**

* KVM virtualization
* 384 MB RAM
* 1 CPU Core
* 10 GB RAID-10 SATA Storage
* 500 GB Monthly Transfer
* 1 IPv4 address
* 10 IPv6 addresses (from your own /64 IPv6 subnet)
* Contract term: 12 months

18 EUR incl. VAT per year (~ 18 USD excl. VAT)

[[ Order Link ]](https://www.ultravps.eu/order/order.pl?cat=cloudserver_lowend&lang=en)

----------------

Storage servers
-------------

Currently available in Amsterdam only.

**Storage Special 1**

* KVM virtualization
* 1 GB RAM
* 1 CPU Core
* 750 GB RAID-10 SATA Storage
* 5 TB Monthly Transfer
* 1 IPv4 address
* 10 IPv6 addresses (from your own /64 IPv6 subnet)
* Contract term: 12 months

48 EUR incl. VAT per year (~ 48 USD excl. VAT)

[[ Order Link ]](https://www.ultravps.eu/order/order.pl?cat=cloudserver_storage&lang=en)

----------------

Looking glasses
